q1: Who is the captain for Argentina?
a2: Two English immigrants, Thomas and James Hogg, organized a meeting on 9 May 1867 in Buenos Aires where the Buenos Aires Football Club was founded.
q3: When was the last time Argentina went to the world cup?
a3: They played in the 2018 World Cup. Perhaps Messi's last one.
a4: The Argentina flag is light blue top and bottom with a white stripe in the middle featuring the Sun of May.
a5: Messi seems to me the best player in history
